price: Onlardan sonra yeryüzüne sizi yerleştireceğiz.  Bu, (kıyamet günü) huzuruma çıkmaktan korkanlar ve azabımdan korkanlar içindir.
arabic: وَلَنُسۡكِنَنَّكُمُ ٱلۡأَرۡضَ مِنۢ بَعۡدِهِمۡۚ ذَٰلِكَ لِمَنۡ خَافَ مَقَامِي وَخَافَ وَعِيدِ

version.title: Turkish translation - Shaaban Britsh
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Turkish by Shaaban Britsh. Notice: Some referred translated verses corrected by Rowwad Translation Center. The original translation is available for suggestions, continuous evaluation and development.

meta.transliteration: walanus'kinannakumu al-arḍa min baʿdihim dhālika liman khāfa maqāmī wakhāfa waʿīdi
translations: And surely We will make you dwell
